enrichedWines.description: A Napa Valley Cabernet from Hendry Winery, known for estate-grown fruit and traditional winemaking. The HRW designation represents their core Cabernet offering with excellent value for Napa quality.

tastingNotes.aroma: Rich with blackcurrant, dark cherry, and cassis. Notes of cedar, vanilla, and mocha from oak aging. Subtle eucalyptus and herbal complexity.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins and balanced acidity. Concentrated dark fruit with layers of chocolate, tobacco, and spice. Elegant Napa character.
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and fine-grained tannins.

enrichedWines.description: A barrel-aged red wine from Oliver Viticultors in Catalonia's Penedès region. The 'Barrica' designation indicates oak aging, adding complexity to indigenous Spanish varieties.

tastingNotes.aroma: Ripe with dark fruit, vanilla, and toast from barrel aging. Notes of Mediterranean herbs, earth, and subtle spice.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with soft tannins from age. Dark fruit flavors with oak influence showing vanilla, coconut, and toast. Balanced with savory complexity.
tastingNotes.finish: Medium to long finish with integrated oak and fruit.

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Blend of Catalan varieties (likely Tempranillo, Garnacha, Cabernet)

enrichedWines.productName: Domaine de la Villaudiere Sancerre Rouge 2019
enrichedWines.description: A rare red Sancerre from the Loire Valley, made from Pinot Noir. While Sancerre is famous for Sauvignon Blanc, red Sancerre showcases elegant, mineral-driven Pinot with Loire terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: Elegant with red cherry, raspberry, and cranberry. Floral notes and earthy undertones. Subtle mineral character from limestone soils.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with silky tannins and bright acidity. Pure red fruit with pronounced minerality and earthy complexity. Refined and delicate Loire character.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, mineral-driven finish with persistent fruit and fine tannins.

enrichedWines.description: A California Cabernet Sauvignon from Rangel Ranch, showcasing ripe fruit character and approachable style with quality oak integration.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bold with blackberry, cassis, and dark cherry. Vanilla, mocha, and cedar from oak aging. Subtle herbal notes.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with moderate tannins. Concentrated dark fruit with chocolate, coffee, and spice. Smooth and approachable.
tastingNotes.finish: Medium to long finish with lingering fruit and oak spice.

enrichedWines.description: A non-vintage wine from the historic Alella DO near Barcelona, offering consistent quality and Mediterranean character year after year.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with citrus, white flowers, and subtle herbal notes. Clean Mediterranean character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Citrus and orchard fruit with mineral backbone. Refreshing and balanced.

enrichedWines.description: A rosé from the Cariñena DO in Aragón, Spain. This wine has some age, developing additional complexity beyond typical young rosé character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Mature with dried strawberry, orange peel, and subtle earthy notes from age. Gentle floral character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with softened acidity. Evolved red berry fruit with savory complexity. Shows development from aging.
tastingNotes.finish: Medium finish with lingering fruit and earthy notes.

enrichedWines.description: A playfully named wine from Charlie and Echo, likely showcasing creative winemaking and approachable character. The whimsical name suggests a fun, accessible wine.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fruit-forward and inviting with ripe berry aromas. Approachable and clean.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins. Juicy fruit flavors with balanced acidity. Easy-drinking and food-friendly.

enrichedWines.description: A white Rioja from Ontañón made from Viura (Macabeo), Rioja's traditional white grape. This wine showcases the crisp, fresh character of quality white Rioja.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with citrus, green apple, and white flowers. Subtle herbal notes and minerality.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Citrus and orchard fruit with mineral backbone. Clean and refreshing.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering citrus and subtle almond notes.

enrichedWines.description: A Chilean Sauvignon Blanc from the Central Valley, showcasing bright fruit character and refreshing acidity at an accessible price point.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromatic with grapefruit, lime, and passion fruit. Herbaceous notes of cut grass and green pepper.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Citrus and tropical fruit with herbaceous character. Refreshing and balanced.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, zesty finish with lingering citrus.

enrichedWines.productName: Castoro Cellars Red Wine Can 250 ml
enrichedWines.description: A canned red wine from Castoro Cellars, offering portability and convenience for outdoor activities and casual drinking. The 250ml can format is perfect for picnics, beaches, and events.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fruit-forward with ripe berry aromas. Approachable and clean.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins. Juicy red fruit flavors. Easy-drinking and refreshing.

wineDetails.style: Canned red wine for casual consumption
wineDetails.ageability: Drink fresh; meant for immediate consumption.
